price: Ebia yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn de deε εyε kyεn no bεhyε yεn anan mu. Nokorε sε, yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn na yɛde y'ani to no soɔ“.
arabic: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبۡدِلَنَا خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ʿasā rabbunā an yub'dilanā khayran min'hā innā ilā rabbinā rāghibūna
